website_summaries.verdict: A veterinarian-recommended cat calming product that is convenient to use and works well at controlling or eliminating behaviors of most anxious felines.
pros: Convenient diffuser refills that fill spacious areas (up to 650 sq
ft.) with vapors of natural, feline pheromone-mimicking formula
Ideal for living spaces with multiple cats, and for introducing new pets
cons: You have to purchase the diffuser separately
Won't deliver results for all felines
but is known to be up to 90% effective

customer_reviews.title: I'm posting 2 stars to get some attention. The ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm posting 2 stars to get some attention. The product works BUT BEWARE!! YOU MUST BUY A NEW DIFFUSER EVERY FEW MONTHS. MY DIFFUSERS JUST STARTED SMOKING AND THE PLASTIC IS SLOWLY BURNING OFF.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS "NOT" FELIWAY!!! This product "contains" ...
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS "NOT" FELIWAY!!! This product "contains" Feliway. We ran out of Feliway and ordered this (thinking it was just new packaging). One of our cats started urinating all over the house again. After 2 months of constantly cleaning (daily) and trying to figure out what was wrong... I realized this was NOT FELIWAY!!! Ordered Feliway and all is well once more. Please do not confuse the two products!!!
customer_reviews.author: cvdv

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the refill for the plug in base. A week later, in the middle of the night, I smelt what seemed like burning wires in the wall. I walked around the foyer and entrance to the bedroom to see if I can tell exactly where it was coming from. I was about to call the fire department when my partner looked down at the outlet where the unit was plugged in and it was overheating and hot as hell. The burning smell was horrible and what would have happened if we were not home at the time or even on vacation? Scary experience. My advice, forget about it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenito

customer_reviews.title: SAFETY HAZARD
customer_reviews.text: Update 10/11/17: Decided to use the second refill, even though I don't have much confidence in the product. Sitting at my desk this evening, I could see tendrils of smoke coming from the diffuser. When I unplugged it, the diffuser was very hot to the touch. This product is a safety hazard. Original review; It's expensive. It didn't keep my cats from fighting. I combined it with the smelly cat-hormone collar. No success. Currently taming feral kittens and set this up in their room after they'd been in captivity for about a week. No difference in their behavior. The area is well under the square footage limit. The final word is: Meh.
customer_reviews.author: Lv2Read

customer_reviews.title: Worth giving a shot if your cat is a pain.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my cat from meowing all night long. She sleeps out in the hallway outside my door. Got a programmable electric timer (this one:  and have it run through the night in 20 minute increments. Makes this stuff last a good 3-4 months per bottle instead of the 1 month the manufacturer says (because they want you to run it 24/7 to make money, duh). But it works on my adopted rescue cat. She was on the streets for about a year before I got her and this stuff saved my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Jason A.

customer_reviews.title: She was acting like she had a urinary tract infection
customer_reviews.text: We just moved into a new house. About 3 weeks before moving, our 8.5 yr old cat snuck out and is gone. Our persian, while she and Roxy weren't buddies, the change is obviously effecting her. At first, the move didn't seem to bother her but in time, she started peeing everywhere except her littler box. She was acting like she had a urinary tract infection, but in finding that it's not common in cats, we went with this, the feliway. It worked. I'm so glad and wish I had tried this before having all those tests done on her
customer_reviews.author: JLR

customer_reviews.title: Love these diffusers- not this particular package
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth box of diffusers I have purchased, originally bought them when we introduced a second cat, but have been using them ever since. I feel like my cat feels more comfortable when it is plugged in. This box that I received arrived with the caps not screwed on all the way so it was a huge mess. The oil was leaking everywhere and everything in the box was soaked. I also received an expired coupon in the box...so I guess they sent me old items. Pretty annoying, and these are things that can easily be fixed. Screw the lids on all the way and don’t sell old merchandise.
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Fake refills?
customer_reviews.text: I have a 5yr old cat and introduced a new cat which was not going well. Someone recommended i try feliway. I was sceptical but it really worked. The hissing and growling went down substantially. The only problem was the refills are $30 a month from petmart, so i was excited when i found two refills for the price of one on Amazon. Unfortunately the hissing, growling and cat fights started back up. To test, I bought another refill from petsmart and yep cat problem got better. I obviously have no way of proving that these refills are fake but I won't purchase these from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Foreman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. I had two cats I never thought would ...
customer_reviews.text: These. Are. Amazing. I had two cats I never thought would have gotten along. Even when we kept them separated, the formerly cheerful, friendly cat became a zombie, had stress diarrhea, and lost 2 lbs. I took him to the vet twice because he was in such bad shape. I got a feliway diffuser on advice from friends, but it didn't seem to work. Then I got 4 more, and put them in every room in the house and within 24 hours, both cats were sooooo much better. They'll probably never be BFFs, but they've stopped trying to kill each other and the cat who was sick is his sweet, loving, playful self again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelcy Sagstetter

customer_reviews.title: Feliine Attitude Adjustment
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats - one a Siamese (Isaac 16 yrs old) and a tiger (Buddy 3 yrs old). I have 3 plug ins in a two story house. Buddy being the newbie to the household (after two of Isaac's fur babies passed in the same year) was a bit too playful for Isaac. These plug-ins were extremely helpful in keeping Buddy's hormones at bay in two of Isaac's sleep areas and one of the rooms where there is a cat box. The plug-ins work - I have noticed a big difference when I have gone without and then have gone to using them. Buddy's aggressive playfulness level is more gentle and they have become more playful than aggressive.
customer_reviews.author: Stretch

customer_reviews.title: WARNING
customer_reviews.text: We didn't notice much difference, but what DID happen is the diffusers left huge oil stains on our newly painted walls. We had to stop immediately and eventually had to repaint above the outlet. REALLY frustrating. The company had no idea why it happened and wasn't very helpful about it.
customer_reviews.author: sjagirl05

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cat Realaxer
customer_reviews.text: We had to make a long relocation with our 17 year old cat and were concerned not only about her making the trip, (by car) - but how she would react to her new environment/home. Our vet recommended this product - we are grateful that she did. We now use Feliway everyday. Something about it just makes our cat "feel" comfortable and that she never left home. During the trip we also used the spray product and sprayed her carrier each day. There is no odder to our human senses, but our cat sure smells something that relaxes her.
customer_reviews.author: Wilbur Wright

customer_reviews.title: Two cats
customer_reviews.text: We have two cats who go in and out during good weather but during the colder months, they don't get to (or want to) go out much. They had gotten to the point where they were fighting, hissing and growling at each other way too much as well as scratching the furniture to the point that we have holes. I have had two diffusers plugged in at different spots in the house for about two weeks. I have notice a marked lessening in the fighting as well as the scratching. It's not gone completely but that's to be expected. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Corri

customer_reviews.title: Hard Time Rating Higher
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time rating this higher than 3-stars. I cannot see any change in mood or anxiety of my multi-cat household and for the price, I'm not sure I want to continue trying it on "good faith." It's hard to measure this in any feasibly way, though, since a cat's temperament will change for a multitude of reasons. I also don't know how effective this could be in a house that isn't a studio apartment, without buying several. As expensive as they are, that's one hell of a leap-of-faith.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Helton

customer_reviews.title: Calming collars work, this does nothing
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat that has extreme anxiety. Collars worked pretty well but now I have an issue where he cries in front of the bedroom door for the entire night ensuring we get no sleep. So I added one of these to the outlet just outside that door to give him an extra boost. This has done nothing to prevent the crying at night or anxiety at all. Additionally there is a cat bed underneath this and while we've never had a marking or urinating problem in the past, after installing this he decided to pee on the cat bed. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Parker

customer_reviews.title: Comfort Zone to the Rescue!
customer_reviews.text: Comfort Zone diffusers absolutely work. I recently adopted an adult female that had been abandoned and my very spoiled, male kitty was having no part of it. Every night as evening would sent in, the fighting and chasing would start. I tried everything, play therapy, separating the cats, a cat tree, special attention, but nothing worked. So then I bought three Comfort Zone diffusers and placed them throughout the house, focusing on the areas where they would usually fight. Within TWO HOURS there was instant calm. The cats are now getting along, all the anxious behavior has stopped and I’m never going to be without Comfort Zone diffusers plugged into the wall. Great stuff and makes your cats happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn D

customer_reviews.title: Placed 4 inches away from marking and did nothing!
customer_reviews.text: Had an issue with one of our cats spraying when we brought a foster into the home. I purchased two of these and placed them where he was spraying. One about 4 inches under a bay window where he sits (and sprays) and another about 12 inches from the sliding door where he was spraying the curtains. They did NOTHING! Even tried the spray. Thought I’d try a second set and again...nothing. These may work for some, but were worthless in my case.
customer_reviews.author: Teach4Peace

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't think this product would work. My cat has separation anxiety and gets an over worked bladder when I'm gone for more than a day. Which continues when I'm back for several weeks. Since it's behavioral the vet suggested this stuff. I was a little annoyed at having to spend so much for plug ins. It works or it's a placebo... either way I plugged these in and within a couple of days she calmed down enough to act normal and stopped attempting to pee on my things. I keep the caps and use them for two weeks when she's anxious then store them away. No odor, doesn't seem to bother my dog.
customer_reviews.author: TMG_FL

customer_reviews.title: Cats really seem to need this.
customer_reviews.text: About 1/3 of the time it doesn't seem to work at all...but when you do get one that is real they are very obviously relaxed and all flop around right near it. They almost need it too much. They get over it quickly after it runs out but it really does help to relax them quite a bit. I suggest only plugging it in a few hours a day since it runs out very quickly otherwise. if you call Amazon customer service (the phone is the only way to do it) you can get the useless junk replaced...other than these "Feelaway" cat products usually water filters need to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: william landreth

customer_reviews.title: If you have cats that are overly aggressive, this ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have cats that are overly aggressive, this stuff really works to calm them down. I currently have two cats (and had one in the past) that are prone to fighting, but are very well behaved when this is in use. I always know when the diffusers are out, as the fighting starts up again. This is basically a generic version of Feliway, wish I'd figured that out sooner! Unfortunately the price has been steadily creeping up ever since I started ordering it on Amazon, and if it continues to increase, there will eventually be little difference between this and brand name Feliway...are you listening sellers?
customer_reviews.author: rbyteme

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works, but each cat is different
customer_reviews.text: We adopted a cat that had been dumped at a shelter 2 times in three years. She is awesome but has anxiety issues. The vet suggested Feliway, and so we got it. It helped quite a bit. At one point she started up in her old anxiety driven ways and we thought the Feliway had failed us. Then we realized both diffusers were dry. I re ordered and within just a day or so she was back to her less anxious, overbathing and pacing self. I am a believer.
customer_reviews.author: Chele

customer_reviews.title: Product brought my kitty back!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. We have a happy and healthy 14 yr old kitty girl. She has the whole upstairs to herself but comes downstairs with us often. Lately she has started yowling in the middle of the night. She seems scared or confused. I tried Feliway first but nothing changed. I ordered this brand, hoping for some relief for my girl. The first night I plugged the diffuser in, we noticed a change in her behavior. She was calmer and much more affectionate. After a couple weeks of having the diffuser, she no longer yowls and is back to her sweet, frisky self. I’m so grateful that I found this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shell O

customer_reviews.title: Keeps cat fights to a minimum
customer_reviews.text: We have two cats who don't always get along. The Comfort Zone product keeps them calmer and the hissy fits to a minimum. It is easy to use. I have one problem and that is the product always comes with a $5 off coupon and I've never found a place on the website to apply it. Would be helpful to find a way. Otherwise, very pleased. I've been using the product for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Copek

customer_reviews.title: Work for me!
customer_reviews.text: I love these things! You might be able to get a better price if one of the pet websites has a sale, usually on the 6 packs as I did at one time. I have used these to help some feral cats while transitioning them to house cats and they truly seem to help the cats relax and feel a part of the household. One cat in particular used to torture me all night with kneading me and crying all night long to be petted, these certainly lessened that behavior by about 75% within the first week. I will continue to buy them as I introduce new cats into my rescue.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Griz

customer_reviews.title: A friend recommended this product when I was having trouble with one ...
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended this product when I was having trouble with one of my cats being a bit aggressive with the other one, and I was very skeptical it would work. I was even more worried about purchasing it because it is a bit pricey and if it didn't work it would be a big waste of money. But this diffuser worked wonders. My stressed kitty calmed down immediately and her aggressive behaviors decreased significantly. In fact, I could tell when the diffuser was empty because her behavior would start to change. These diffusers are expensive but worth the price if you have a multi cat household and a cat experiencing stress due to this.
customer_reviews.author: Celissa Masey

customer_reviews.title: It works! Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is a lifesaver. Our 4 year old female cat has started scratching and not using her box, including peeing when she’s sitting right in front of us looking right at us! We have a 3 year old male cat too but my mother recommended these pheromones and it’s a lifesaver. It’s a small price to pay for something to keep our fur babies from wrecking the house. It calms them down. If you’re having issues w your cats and re-homing isn’t an option, please try this first!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Bayer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by my Veterinarian
customer_reviews.text: Female cats don't always get along. I use both the multi cat formula and the regular formula together to stop both tension between my cats and urinating in inappropriate places.
customer_reviews.author: llove2laugh21

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by Vet's & Works Well
customer_reviews.text: We used Comfort Zone Plug-in Diffuser in every room. They last about 30 days before needing to replace the filter. Our kitty would go up to it and smell them daily to calm his biting behavior. It worked really well. We recommended it to other families with feline behavioral issues, such as urinary issues and scratching issues. All positive reports back. Our vet said that the American Association of Feline Friendly Hospitals states that every vet office should have a plug-in diffuser now in every room to calm kitties when they go the the vet's office.
customer_reviews.author: FelineFriendly

customer_reviews.title: Comfort Zone really works!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased both the plug=in and spray several times in the past. This is a great product. I have 10 cats in the house and one of them has occasional problems and gets a bit wacky and starts going after my ankles and biting. Comfort Zone puts a stop to these behaviors in just a matter of a day or two. Everybody else is calmer and my eldest cat (he is 12) is much calmer and less likely to swat anybody else for minor "transgressions" (like sticking their head in "his" bed. Well worth the money spent. I plan to be sure I have plenty on hand from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Angelique T. Fehr

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure how to tell if this works or not. Well, I plugged it in when I first got my cat, to help with the transition - and then I ran out... She was running around like she was stung by a bee or something. It took me a few days to realize that this had run out, and an hour after I plugged in the new one, she was back to herself. I have my sister using it as well now. Would highly recommend, especially for a cat that is on edge!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This helped a lot--but its not a miracle worker
customer_reviews.text: This stuff helps. Two new room mates + their cat was driving my 2 cats insane. The new one chased one of mine constantly. All 3 of them decided to mark any territory they could get their paws on. I spent a fortune on Bissell's "Ewww, What's That Smell" enzyme carpet cleaner (which is incredibly effective, the only one I've found that works) before trying Feliway. So now I'm spending a fortune on this stuff, but it's definitely been more peaceful-not conflict free, but less terrorism. And I haven't bought more 'Ewww' in 3 weeks. (The spray bottle stopped break-through marking!) In short, don't expect a miracle, but with diligence & patience, you can definitely improve everybody's mood!
customer_reviews.author: PVH

customer_reviews.title: This product really helps.
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats, and the older female began being a little troublemaker when we introduced the male last year. When I caught her urinating in a corner I was concerned, so we visited the vet. After confirming that nothing physically was wrong, he mentioned that I may want to try this product. Quite simply this product reduces those "accidents" tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Wilking

customer_reviews.title: The one good thing, this product is more affordable through Amazon ...
customer_reviews.text: My Mom moved in with me and she has two cats. I have some cats, and our cats were not getting along. Someone told my Mother to buy this product. We thought it was helping, so we continued two more months. It is not working...a couple of the indoor cats still hiss, snarl, growl, screech at one another, and they have been living with me for almost six months. I surely wished this product did work...we do use catnip, which helps. The one good thing, this product is more affordable through Amazon Prime, than at Petco/Petsmart or Walmart...Thank you Amazon Prime for keeping prices real (affordable).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not last long.
customer_reviews.text: I'm reviewing the refills although I haven't received yet because the one I ordered with the plug in doesnt last very long. It's almost out and its been 2 weeks since I ordered it. No way these things last 30 days. Not sure if they are working yet which is why I'm giving it 3 star instead of 2. But this would get very expensive having to change out twice a month. I guess on the refill I'll have to take a sharpie and mark it to see how long it lasts per week. But I have less than 1/4 left after 2 weeks. I tried these a few years ago. I think this is why I stopped.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L.

customer_reviews.title: Saved me from heartbreak
customer_reviews.text: Ended up literally being a life saver for my semi feral, stressed kitty. I was at my wits end, as she just wouldn't come out from hiding when we got the dog. She was always angry, no matter what we did to make things better. 6 months she was like that. Always hiding. We were desperate for a solution, including considering putting her outside. She couldn't be adopted out, she's terrified of everyone. This was my last ditch effort before she or the dog went. It did the trick, and I have my beloved little snuggle ball back. She still doesn't care for the dog, but it's nothing serious.
customer_reviews.author: JapanFreak

customer_reviews.title: Worth a shot - helps in many cases
customer_reviews.text: These work differently for each cat--just like catnip. There is no surefire way to tell if this is going to be the magic serum for your cats behavioral problems. That being said, it's well worth a try. The pheromone Feliway is well regarded as helping many cats. I used this for a couple months to help my cat in a period of transition--we were moving, and a new cat was being brought into the house. It calmed her down a little, I think. She started acting more like herself that evening. These are so very expensive, though, so if you're going to invest in them make sure you absolutely need them.
customer_reviews.author: Skywalker

customer_reviews.title: Can work but there are exceptions
customer_reviews.text: These seem to work. we have 3 cats and we had a problem with spraying with one of them. it did not work well enough to stop him. However, we since found out that he was probably doing this at our old home and we just did not find out about it. We took him into the vet and there was no physical problem with the cat. The diagnosis is that he is probably getting a bit senile and once he got into the habit of spraying, there was not anything that would stop him. He is now an outside cat, but we bring him in with a cage in the cold part of the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Ron L

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. My new cat Willow (like the movie). I had willow in a room with this until she became comfortable. The vet recommended this. Two days in she started becoming comfortable and she used the litterbox didn't scratch up anything in the room. She got comfortable and started playing quickly. I like it and think it works great. So, I haven't used these refills yet. But I bought the pack with the plugin apparatus and 1 of these. The refills screw into the plugin part. I love that it lets me know it is secure. I have had mine for two weeks, and empty rate of the refill seems like it will last the rest of the month.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff palmer

customer_reviews.title: Refills for the helpful Feliway dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Our Cat Civilization has factions. Sometimes these factions collide. The Feliway dispenser does seem to moderate the level of such uprest, at least in the bathroom where it is installed- and where everyone gets fed, and the favorite litter box resides. Now, I also periodically employ Mr Spray Bottle if things really get out of hand... but generally the Feliway seems to discourage that. Mostly. Note: no actual violence, even when they are at their worst- but a LOT of snarling and cussing, mostly in the middle of the night, when I am not especially sympathetic. And thus, I appreciate the Feliway.
customer_reviews.author: CissaTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: I have 2 kittens who have been doing their best to destroy my curtains and would not let me ...
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if this would work or not. I have 2 kittens who have been doing their best to destroy my curtains and would not let me sleep at night. I got this for my bedroom and my dining room where I often have guest. Withing a few weeks of having this plugged in, I'm sleeping all night and my curtains are once again safe. After a month of peace I unplugged this to see what would happen and within a week the kittens are waking me up and climbing my curtains again. I plugged them back in and all is calm where I need calm. I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: AmyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I think this helped my cat at first because he ...
customer_reviews.text: I think this helped my cat at first because he was high strung and wouldn't let us pet him for very long without scratching or biting (even when he was cuddling with us), but after a few bottles, I wasn't seeing a noticeable difference between his behavior with and without the diffuser. I think it helped initially, and maybe it helped him just calm down overall, but we don't need it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra W.

customer_reviews.title: IONLY lasted 18days until empty
customer_reviews.text: So I had this delivered Sept.12th,plugged both in & both were empty Sept.30st. Thats like 18 days. It says it will last for 30days. So Im not happy with that. 😒 I neither can say if the product actually helps because it only lasted that short of a time.
customer_reviews.author: PBP

customer_reviews.title: Miracle worker!
customer_reviews.text: This is like some kind of magical elixir that tamed my three cats that used to fight with each other and loved to scratch carpet and furniture. Using the diffuser and also the cat collars has made my home a happy place again. No more hissing, no more scratching, no more fighting. I know this might not work for everyone, but after a week, I hardly knew my cats because their behavior improved so much. My oldest cat, who has arthritis, finally doesn't have to run and hide from the two younger cats that we adopted from the local animal shelter. I'm sold on this and the collars. Together these products have helped restore sanity in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky

customer_reviews.title: I will continue to have these in my home to keep my shy cat happy and at ease
customer_reviews.text: These Feliway diffuser refills have changed my shy cats life. He is out and about in the house more and he plays with his toys. He still hides when everyone comes to visit, but he is so much more social with us. I change them out every 30 days or so. I will continue to have these in my home to keep my shy cat happy and at ease. I am very happy with this product and will continue to purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Ann Patton

customer_reviews.title: Product is great, delivery is messy...
customer_reviews.text: This product does help my stressed out cat. He is a scratcher and has stress induced bladder inflammation which results in him peeing in inappropriate places. I've noticed that this helps a bit and I'll take what I can get! What is really disappointing though is that 50% of the time (I have a subscription) at least one of the bottle leaks and makes an oily mess all over the place and reduces the usable amount of product! These things aren't cheap and need to be replaced monthly, so needing multiples in your home and losing a quarter of the product makes it really frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Suzy S

customer_reviews.title: Dry wick, unable to function, fire hazard
customer_reviews.text: I recieved a 2 pack. I think they may have been old product because both wicks were dry after being plugged in for just two days. The bottle was still full. I recapped it and stored it upside down then installed the second one. That one also developed a dry wick in a couple of days with a full bottle. If the wick gets dry it becomes a fire hazard. This was my second order. My first single unit order worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: This product works!
customer_reviews.text: I’m amazed how this product works. I have two of them plugged in. One in finished basement and one upstairs in spare bedroom. It took two weeks to work but my male cat is not urinating anymore other than in kitty box. He use go different places in home. Now nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Christina H.

customer_reviews.title: Keep Calm And Carry On
customer_reviews.text: We brought a new kitten into our household of two adult cats. Knowing the transition could be rough, I purchased several of these diffusers. How well do they work? We noticed everyone being overly aggressive for a few days and realized that the feliway has run out upstairs. We put in a new bottle and things settled down again. Will be using these for a long while I think. 😉 Have used feliway off and on for years and always had great success with the product. And amazon usually has the best price.
customer_reviews.author: Audrie R.

customer_reviews.title: Burning plastic smell
customer_reviews.text: I have use this product successfully in the past. We recently added a new cat, and I ordered this in order to help the cats relax. Unfortunately, after having it plugged in for about two hours, I noticed a horrible melting plastic smell. I traced it upstairs to the diffuser. The oil receptacle was coatrd in a clear substance, which I think was the diffused oil. The entire thing smelled like burning plastic. It’s not worth risking a house fire! I am returning it today.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: Miracle worker!!
customer_reviews.text: I have an adopted stray, who was doing fine until I took in a deceased person's cat. After a few trips to the vet for urinary issues, (blocked I thought) and a diagnosis of sensitive soul, switched his food to a calming type. That stopped the spasmed urethra. But he started peeing everywhere, spraying everything. I couldn't live like this. I purchased this baby and within a week, we were back to normal. I'm about 6 mos in to using these and have not had anymore problems
customer_reviews.author: sparky47

customer_reviews.title: Product is good; packaging is horrible
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product consistently for almost 6 years. Whenever the diffuser stops diffusing, I know because my two cats get aggressive with each other. But the diffusers are expensive and the packaging is horrible. So much plastic - and it's the kind that can cut you to the bone if you're not careful. The refill containers are recyclable, but the clamshell-esque packaging is unnecessary. Until they packaging can be a bit more earth-friendly, I'm going to look for natural de-stressors for my pets.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie Moore

customer_reviews.title: The plug-in unit gets VERY hot!!
customer_reviews.text: I really haven't seen any change at all in my cats' behavior. But even more upsetting (for me) was that the unit gets so hot that it was almost too hot to touch and beyond that, I could smell almost a burning odor. NOT impressed with that at all! I've since unplugged it and I'm very hesitant to use it further.
customer_reviews.author: mom_mc1

customer_reviews.title: I only gave this 3 Stars for 2 reasons. ...
customer_reviews.text: I only gave this 3 Stars for 2 reasons. 1st: In my experience, the original Feliway Brand Refills tend to last longer. Note: None of the Refills last up to a month as promised. Lucky if I get 3 weeks. 2nd: This particular batch, priced even cheaper than the 6-Pack Singles Batch I had been buying, was leaking. Two of the three 2-Packs that I bought, had leaked badly into the packaging. The Grey plastic lids were not screwed on tightly when packaged. You're not supposed to get this stuff on your hands! Think this is why the 2-Packs may be priced cheaper now? Getting rid of a large, leaky lot?
customer_reviews.author: Goldlinda

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Our vet recommended these because our 14 year old cat appeared to be stressed out over something and was urinating under our bed. The urinating has stopped and the cat is so calm. She just lays around most of the day and even lets our rambunctious 3 year old pet and hug on her instead of running away sometimes. The difference in her personality is completely unbelievable but we have been using now for about 3 months regularly.
customer_reviews.author: RNiswonger780

customer_reviews.title: I really recommend if you have an anxious cat to give this ...
customer_reviews.text: Recently moved and finally got my Feliway plug put back in for my kitty. The house is small and cozy so the Feliway affects the 650ft area with her catbox all the way to her cat tree. She has been much calmer, quieter, and friendlier and it's only been a week. Getting two refills at the price I did was worth it to make her be at ease! I really recommend if you have an anxious cat to give this a try.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Mead

customer_reviews.title: Calms cat with anxiety
customer_reviews.text: I have a Maine Coon with anxiety, to the point where he will hide under the bed for an hour if a stranger knocks on the door. Now, when he gets upset he will sit directly under the diffuser to calm himself. He's much happier overall and we're keeping this stocked at all times :)
customer_reviews.author: Emily Carlin

customer_reviews.title: Cat spraying issues? Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if it worked. But when we didn't refill the defuser we had some issues with are kitties marking. We have 3 cats and two started spraying in our common areas. That is Unacceptable! It can ruin your home and belongings. This along with two kitty litters and constant cleaning of litters solved our issue. This with a urine remover spray, don't use bleach since it has ammonia in it and the cats WILL return to spray. Will be a game changing if you love your two competing alpha females and they are battling by urine in your house.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle W.

customer_reviews.title: Helps cats adjust to change!
customer_reviews.text: After moving to a new, larger home in January, one of our 3 cats started overgrooming her belly, creating bald spots and rashy red patches. After eliminating any physical causes (like allergies), I figured I’d give this a try to ease her stress. We now use them consistently around the house in multiple areas and Tuna is back to her normal grooming habits! These will be a constant in our home to keep our kitties well-adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Creger

customer_reviews.title: Calms My Wife As Well
customer_reviews.text: My wife thinks these help her cat be relaxed and friendly. I think the cat has always been relaxed and friendly, However, when my wife has these things plugged in, she THINKS the cat benefits and that makes her more relaxed and friendly. I recommend these for relaxing and producing a better socialized cat and wife. What a combo for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Thorne HamstringTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Made moving with a cat easier
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use while moving with my cat. I've used it for 2 moves now with great results. I haven't noticed any smell or significant amount of power draw from it. This came recommended by my vet to help cats acclimate and feel more comfortable to a new environment. My cat was back to his normal routine within only a few days after each move. He didn't have any bad behavior or marking instances throughout the whole thing. The first move we made with him he took 2 weeks to adjust. This was a great way to help ease the transition. I will definitely buy this again for any life change that my cat would be stressed about.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lemak

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for a stressed fur-chewing cat
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a little over six months now. My cat has been stressed and chewing out his own fur for a little over a year. I put him through every test and on so many rounds of medication to rule out anything physical, and after months of expensive tests and treatments (not to mention torturing my poor stressed kitty with so many visits to the vet), it turns out that the least invasive and pretty damn inexpensive option is working. He's letting his fur grow back, he's more cuddly, and just seems more like himself than he has in so long. I am so happy!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Kolafa

customer_reviews.title: We've been using Feliway for years now, It really does work!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using Feliway for years now. It helps keep our large cat and dog family calmer and happier. Also helps greatly with those who are afraid of thunder, fireworks and vacuums. Make sure to start it at least 30 to 60 days prior to a fireworks holiday and you should see a difference. It does take time and you don't even know it's working. There is no smell, you do need to check them and get the refills about every 30 to 60 days. We've even tested it... if we stop it... we can tell everyone's a little more edgy. It really does work!
customer_reviews.author: herizondetails

customer_reviews.title: Bringing a new kitten in the home with an older ...
customer_reviews.text: Bringing a new kitten in the home with an older cat was difficult. This really did seem to make their stress levels lessen. I had one in every room of the house for the first few months. We are are going on 7 months and I am down to just one in the main living room where they all seem to spend the most time. I also used the calming collar on my older cat. She was having a hard time adjusting and this made her a little "nicer."
customer_reviews.author: Susan C

customer_reviews.title: My vet recommended these diffusers when I started having issues with my ...
customer_reviews.text: My vet recommended these diffusers when I started having issues with my cat after quite a few changes in my life. They seemed to work well. They help him relax a little. It’s defiantly not a complete fix for my cat. You have to buy the part that plugs into the wall, then buy the refills. I plug them in when we get my other half’s daughter for the weekend. I pair these, with calming treats, and a calming collar and it seems to work. The set usually comes with a coupon that can be used later. That’s a big help as these are not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Keket Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Stopped my cat from peeing everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: Helps my cat to not pee on the carpet. Have a 12 year old cat that was used to ruling the house. When we got a puppy last year, my cat started to pee everywhere. We put this in his litter area and put a baby gate up to keep the dog out (as kind of a "safe place" for the cat) and he eventually started coming around again. He no longer pees on the carpet. We have used these for about 1 year, regularly. Haven't tried to stop using them and see if it affects my cat's behavior or not.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: which is great compared to what we were dealing with
customer_reviews.text: Our cat was weeing on shoes, rugs, and spraying on everything! He is on special food for his past urinary issues, but he still continued to make a mess. I was skeptical of this product but decided to give it a try since I was at the end of my rope with my cats behavior. It works! I have been using it for about a month now and we have only had one spraying episode, which is great compared to what we were dealing with. Our cat has a favorite chair to lounge in and I placed the unit in the outlet right behind that chair. Good Luck!
customer_reviews.author: Joe C

customer_reviews.title: Feliway is really helping!
customer_reviews.text: This product really helps cats that come into my veterinary medical practice relax. We have a "cat only" room. We do not allow dogs into this room. We have the Feliway diffuser going 24/7 and we spray towels with The Feliway Spray 30 minutes before each cat appointment arrives. All this allow the cats to be more relaxed during there visits. The Feliway refills that go with the room diffuser and the spray on the towels and even on our hands has been a bit hit with the cats and with their owners.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Sprouse

customer_reviews.title: My bottles are not working, still full after being plugged in for 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I think I received a package of feliway that was expired? I’ve had it plugged in for 3 weeks, and it is still full. I’ve tried different bottle holders and still nothing. I paid $25 so my cat would be less stressed and it’s upsetting that the infuser won’t put out the scent. UPDATE: After reading other reviews, I don't think it's the bottle that isn't working, but the plug in is defective! How do I get a working plug in? I have 2 now that don't work and 4 bottles of feliway I can't use, so irritating!
customer_reviews.author: jodie hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe it works!
customer_reviews.text: Was very skeptical that this product would useful but I was at the end of my rope with cats peeing and spraying in the dining room. The first day I plugged it in the cats peed in the room so I assumed the plug in was not going to work, however they did not do it again. By the second day, both cats were lounging close to the plug in, content and quiet. They now regularly lounge in the room and have not peed or marked. The bad news is they have chosen a new spot to mark so I will be getting more for other areas.
customer_reviews.author: moonwomyn

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and doesn't last as long as claimed
customer_reviews.text: This product is way too expensive for the amount of time it lasts. The manufacturer claims the diffuser lasts for 30 days, but it's more like 15 days. Also, I'm not sure if this product actually does what it's supposed to do, which is to comfort anxious cats and help stop them from spraying all over the house. Due to the price and questionable effectiveness, I would probably not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: KK Slider

customer_reviews.title: Cat raised hell when we unplugged it
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize how much this helped my little man, Marley. I initially bought it to help keep the peace between my two kitties. I noticed that happened and they got along very well. My boyfriend unplugged the diffuser while arranging some plugs for the tv. Four days later, Marley and Lux we're fighting, Marley was spraying, and scratching. We plugged it back in, and Marley is behaving! Totally impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Cat Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I was interested in purchasing this product to deal with some new behavioral problems being displayed by my two aging cats. Both are considered mature cats, ages 12 and 14. The older cat had pulled out a lot of hair on his tail and the younger cat has started to pee outside the litter box. After using the product, all the hair on the older cat's tail has grown back. The younger cat is still having some accidents outside of the litter box but it has decreased. Over all, I have been impressed by the results and will continue to use this product. It is much more affordable through this company than at our local pet stores.
customer_reviews.author: TarHeel09

customer_reviews.title: Crazy cat lady's secret weapon
customer_reviews.text: My cats are super sensitive emotional nutcases. This stuff is a LIFE SAVOR!!!! I have 3 cats, and they're prone to urinary infections when something stressful happens in the home. Example - me adding a third cat, means my other cat wants to pee on the bathroom rug as therapy. This is cheaper than Prozac but I haven't ruled that out either. I put this in the laundry room near their litter boxes and have noticed a difference with them when it runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But I've used it in the hopes that it's helping him feel more comfortable. I think it's a little expensive
customer_reviews.text: I've learned that if I don't rate something, I continuously get requests to rate it. So this is an attempt to stop the requests even though I have very little to offer.. I can only give it an average rating because I bought it and started using it a week after I adopted a 3 yr. old cat who'd been in several shelters, so I have no idea if it's working or not. I don't know what his behaviour would have been had I not made the purchase and plugged it in. But I've used it in the hopes that it's helping him feel more comfortable. I think it's a little expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Magical Product!!
customer_reviews.text: Turns grumpy cat to loving cat. Couldn't believe it! Brought home little spayed female. Thought my 1 year old neutered make would love her. Instead he wanted to eat her and hump her. I was sad and anxious until I called a vet and she told me about this product. Plugged it in. Soon chasing and growling turned into a love fest-two kitties laying in each other's arms licking heads, faces, closed eyes-contented happy cats. Best friends now=Peaceful happy home.
customer_reviews.author: seeks4life

customer_reviews.title: Great but check for leakage upon arrival.
customer_reviews.text: This works well with my now senior aged cat. It calms her and as she has cancer it is a huge asset for her care. This package contained one that leaked within the inner packaging. I had rec. it on Sat. and took it out today. Amazon has replaced this so am not deducting any stars for a defect. This product also has curbed her aggressive tendency and anxiety when I first adopted her. It has made for one quiet household.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy  MTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Cats mellow as a cello last few years sniffin this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps three cats mellow inside, 2 cat doors but inside they on occasion get a bit testy --- it works for me Pheromones I think - Sure the heads overheat after a few uses but I always use a buffer plug on my outlets. I have noticed a bit of aggression checked bottle and it was empty. May use a timer as earlier reviewer suggested and save money. Living in a small cabin one unit seems to " calm the savage beast " , wish I would have found this snake oil sooner as my cats are convinced it works. Could be like catnip just don't work on some.
customer_reviews.author: White Lives Matter Bezos

customer_reviews.title: Does not work to prevent spraying.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this zero stars, I would. I have a neutered male Bengal cat that has had a spraying problem his whole life. I have been using these plugins for a YEAR and they have done absolutely nothing to even reduce this problem. 90% effective? Yea lucky me getting the cat in the 10%. This stuff is way too expensive not to help at all. DONE.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher EvensenTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Unaffordable
customer_reviews.text: I think this works. My one cat is very neurotic and this has decreased her scratching near where I plugged it in. The problem is that it only works in a small area and I would need at least 4 of these going at the same time for it to be really effective which I might do but it's absolutely impossible as it's very expressive. $10 each would cost $40 a month plus the part that plug in itself needs replacing every so often. Just not a good option.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I really am amazed at how well this works, I saw them in the Vets office and my vet said they work great. When cats get alarmed they give off a scent that means "WARNING DANGER"! This stuff overpowers and keeps the cat calm. I have a cat that is scared of people and hides when anyone comes over but with this plugged in she comes right out. The spray also works great I have that on hand also for an extra "boost" it basically gives a comfort scent for them. This does not smell, WE mere humans cannot
customer_reviews.author: AaronDrTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Can’t stand the smell
customer_reviews.text: This is not Feliway brand. The title of the item makes that quite confusing. It seems like it works for some people but as soon as I plug it in I can smell it and it gives me a headache. I try to remember to plug it in only when I am not home... but the cat has still been marking everywhere. I was looking for a way to write the seller but could not find one. If this gets your attention, I would love a refund for the unused refill. I understand that I used the first one and I’ll have to take the loss, but I cannot handle having this plugged in in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Just didn't work for our problem.
customer_reviews.text: We have used two of these diffusers in our home for 2 months and have seen no effect on our aggressive cat. Our veterinarian suggested we try this, due the aggressive behavior of our Maine Coon toward our newer female tabby. Both have been neutered/spayed. He has just been bullying her non stop. We have to keep them separated, which is a pain. We had hopes that this product would calm him down, but it has not and she is a nervous wreck.
customer_reviews.author: Broncomaniac

customer_reviews.title: This product produces an amazing change in my cat
customer_reviews.text: I have a tiny cat that I adopted as a kitten. She is beyond terrified of everything, and will hide all day. When I use the feliway, she actually comes out and is quite affectionate. A stranger, or the doorbell will still make her hide, but it enables her to be more like a normal cat the rest of the time.
customer_reviews.author: reasonablewoman

customer_reviews.title: I was hoping this would have a calming effect but....
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would calm my kitties (4) but it didn’t seem to have any effect on them. It only lasts about a month and I tried it for 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: P McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Expired product?
customer_reviews.text: The refill pack came with a coupon and an announcement of a "new look"...for 2018! So, it is 2 years old. I do not know if expiration dates apply not only to the coupon but also the product, but I found it a bit disconcerting. The cats were locked in battle last night; not a shining endorsement. We'll see...
customer_reviews.author: gw4cats

customer_reviews.title: stops my cat from being a jerk
customer_reviews.text: My cat decided that it is OK for him to pee on the kitchen counter. Tried cleaning, bleaching, taking all things off this section of the counter with no change. Bought these and the counter peeing stopped immediately. I can always tell as soon as it runs out because I find pee on the counter again. I really wish these were cheaper, but will pay the price to stop my cat from being a jerk.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kern

customer_reviews.title: Amazing change in cat
customer_reviews.text: This product made an amazing positive change in my grumpy 12 year old cat, SnowMeow. I was skeptical but soooo glad I tried it! She used to get annoyed and aggressive when the grandkids were around. She’s more present and gentle. I was skeptical but now wouldn’t do without the product! There is absolutely no odor detection; I keep it near our living room; I have no idea how it works but it does!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Rahn

customer_reviews.title: Order these BEFORE you move!
customer_reviews.text: 4 cats + two moves within 3 weeks + new home smell = MUCH NEEDED to calm them all down. This really helped them get comfortable quicker and to adjust faster. My kittehs are doing fantastic now.
customer_reviews.author: elysejazz

customer_reviews.title: Totally calmed down my stressed out, frantically meowing cat
customer_reviews.text: My cat, Enoch, used to pace around in the evenings, vocalizing and stressing out over some stray cats that he could see outside. Since using this product, he is calm, playful, mellow and content. Enoch has FIV, so this product is great for helping his immune system to not become compromised by stress. 5 stars! Will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: A. D. Brandt

customer_reviews.title: The vet recommended that in addition to a healthy diet
customer_reviews.text: I have a stray that I adopted - Tom Cat - who had the urinary crystals. He had one big scare and two minor scares. The vet recommended that in addition to a healthy diet, that we purchase feliway. After Tom Cat's crystal problems, he was peeing on anything and everything (e.g. rugs, my gym bag, the couches, etc). Once we got Feliway diffuser, no more kitty pee problems. Tom Cat is still Captain of the swat team but he doesn't pee everywhere and that is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Gets hot, didn't help the cat
customer_reviews.text: It is most likely my cat, but these don't seem to help her. I also do not like that they get very hot when they are plugged in. That makes me a bit paranoid about where I plug them in as I don't want my son to touch them or for them to catch anything on fire. I don't think they are worth it, especially for the cost, but again, it does not help my cat. If it seemed to help her, I might consider keeping them, but the heat factor is still a little un-nerving.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: It actually works
customer_reviews.text: Really works. Oh my goodness it works. I really thought it was a gimmick and did not expect it to work but it actually does. You have to have one in each room though. We had a cat introduction go terribly wrong. It was traumatic for both the cats and us. Cat would just fight and fight. We bought Comfort Zone put one in each room and after 2 months of use the cats are great friends now. Comfort Zone really saved us
customer_reviews.author: The Five Star Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: The cat can definitely tell!
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing how I smell NOTHING but my cat is fascinated with these. I've been using them for about two months now. Trying to calm a cat who gets extremely agitated around guests. While I won't say these have solved all our problems, she does enjoy the smell and it's just part of our routine now. We recently moved and I think this helped quite a bit with her adjustment. Hoping to continue to see more results!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Happy kitties!
customer_reviews.text: All the comfort zone and feliway products are great. We had some seriously stressed out cats when there were strays in he neighborhood as well as introducing a new kitten into the home and moving four cats an hour away. The comfort zone and feliway products really calmed our cats and made all those stressful situations easier. Everybody couldn't be happier. We have the diffusers on each floor of our home and it doesn't take a million of them to keep the whole house calm. Say goodbye to kitty stress acne. Thanks comfort zone and feliway.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: calms my anxious kitty
customer_reviews.text: My cat is 11 years old and has always been very vocal. Meowing and howling when I am not home or in the middle of the night. Nothing calms him down like this stuff. If fact, I know that it is time to change to a new refill when he starts meowing and howling. He has never had a problem with urine marking or scratching so I can't speak to the efficacy of that but if your cat meows constantly due to anxiety, I suggest giving this a try.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Really works! Totally helped make my cats calm down.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Brought my daughter's two cats into our home and they were so stressed that I thought they weren't going to make it. They hate our two cats and even though they were in a separate room they still would not come out of the closet. My friend recommended this product and it worked like a charm. They are totally different cats now. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: tweiler81

customer_reviews.title: Plug in not reusable.  Buy the whole kit
customer_reviews.text: Bought refill. Unfortunately, all 3 of the diffusers I had overheated when I tried to reuse them. They smelled like burning rubber. I unplugged them as it was a horrible smell and possible fire hazard. Not sure if I'll buy another plug in or get the Feliway ones.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Shauver

customer_reviews.title: Helps our scared kitty!
customer_reviews.text: We have a very nervous cat who's basically afraid of her own shadow. We started using this when we went away and had to leave her at someone's house. It seemed to help quite a bit and now we use it all over our house in general - seems to calm her down a bit. Bought more diffusers to cover more rooms in the house. Have had the first one for at least a year or so and haven't had any problems at all. I would recommend this to anyone with a cat who has anxiety or is skittish.
customer_reviews.author: Carie

customer_reviews.title: Can't tell if it's really working or not.
customer_reviews.text: Like it says, human's can't smell it, which is nice. We've been using this for about 6 months and I have no idea it it's actually working for our cat. When a family member went away for the summer, our cat nervously over-groomed and licked the hair off of her belly and legs. It's growing back, but the family member also returned. We also bring this with when we travel... again, not so sure it's doing anything for our cat, but I guess it helps me feel better?
customer_reviews.author: Eric Nowariak

customer_reviews.title: It doesnt work for every cat, but I think ...
customer_reviews.text: It doesnt work for every cat, but I think its working for mine. I had a stressed kitty that was bullied by my older cat. We did everything we could to stop the urinating in unwanted places but for some reason he kept doing it on pillows on the couch. Uuuugh! I bought this as a last resort and placed a litter box enclosure and this plug in near the problem area. With both of those solutions, the problem has stopped. I think the diffuser has helped.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

product_meta.title: Comfort Zone Feliway Diffuser Refills for Cats and Kittens, 2 Pack
product_meta.description: Comfort Zone products with Feliway are clinically proven 90% effective at reducing urine marking and vertical scratching. The Comfort Zone with Feliway Diffuser product dispenses a drug-free, odorless vapor that mimics a cat’s natural calming pheromones. This vapor signals to your cat that the area is friendly and safe, reducing your cat’s need to spray and scratch. It helps to reduce or completely stop unwanted behavior due to stress-related issues such as multiple pet household, transition from shelter or breeder, moving, home remodeling or furniture changes, or changes in people and pets in the home. Don't let unwanted behaviors ruin your relationship with your cat. Replace Comfort Zone with Feliway refills every 30 days to keep your cat feeling safe and comfortable. This refill works with Comfort Zone Diffusers with Feliway and Feliway Diffusers.
feature_bullets: Refills fit Comfort Zone Diffusers with Feliway and Feliway Diffusers
Mimics cat pheromone that helps with cat calming
Helps reduce urine marking and unwanted scratching
Satisfaction guaranteed or your money back
Comfort Zone products with Feliway are clinically proven to be 90% effective
Replace Comfort Zone with Feliway refills every 30 days
Veterinarian Recommended, Drug Free, and Unscented
One refill covers up to 650 sq ft

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
